Our Expert Instructors

Learn from industry leaders with decades of hands-on experience

Our faculty combines extensive field experience with advanced academic credentials. Each instructor brings real-world expertise from leading amusement facilities, regulatory bodies, and safety organizations worldwide.

Dr. Sarah Mitchell, P.E.

Chief Safety Officer

Licensed Professional Engineer, NAARSO Level III Inspector

25+ years experience in ride design and safety systems. Former Chief Inspector for Cedar Fair Entertainment Company.

James Rodriguez, CIT

Senior Ride Inspector

Certified Inspector Technician, ASTM F24 Committee Member

20+ years in ride maintenance and inspection. Expert in hydraulic and pneumatic systems.

Maria Chen, Ph.D.

Risk Assessment Specialist

Ph.D. Mechanical Engineering, IAAPA Safety Committee

Research focus on predictive maintenance and failure analysis in amusement rides.

Robert Thompson, QSI

Quality & Standards Director

Qualified Standards Inspector, ISO 9001 Lead Auditor

Expert in international safety standards and regulatory compliance across multiple jurisdictions.
